sen.j: 来目 塩籠（くめ の しおこ、生年不明 - 天武天皇元年7月（672年））は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: KUME no Shioko (year of birth unknown - 672) was a person who lived during the Asuka Period.

sen.j: 672年の壬申の乱のとき河内国国司で、大海人皇子（天武天皇）に従おうとして軍を集めたが、露見して自殺した。
sen.e: He was the Provincial Governor of Kawachi Province during the Jinshin War in 672, and tried to raise an army under the orders of Prince Oama (Emperor Tenmu), but committed suicide after his plans were exposed by the enemy.

sen.j: 壬申の乱が勃発してから双方が兵力を興す中で、河内は大友皇子（弘文天皇）側に入り、大海人皇子側についた倭（大和国）の大伴吹負と勢力圏を接した。
sen.e: In the midst where both armies were vying to consolidate their forces after the break out of the Jinshin War, the Kawachi Province sided with Prince Otomo (Emperor Kobun), leveling their sphere of influence against OTOMO no Fukei of Wa Province (Yamato Province) who joined Prince Oama's forces.
